title: Developer
description: As a recent Wyncode graduate, I am now seeking a full time role as a Full Stack Developer. During my time at Wyncode, I learned HTML, CSS, JavaScript with libraries such as jQuery and React, Ruby with Ruby on Rails framework and Postgres. I was also exposed to Agile methodologies, Test Driven Development using Rspec and Capybara, along with Express for Node.js. I am excited to learn, advance my skills, and start my career!

title: Mixologist
description: Mixologist? Bartender? What's the difference?! As a Bartender for many years , focusing on attending guests, making them feel welcomed, and entertained is key. We move quick and perform under pressure at high volume when needed. As a Mixologist , designing high quality cocktails with a superior knowledge of spirits is just as important. Mixology involves  preparation of house-made syrups, bitters, liquor infusions and other ingredients for quality cocktails that fit the style of the establishment.

title: Fitness Enthusiast
description: I enjoy staying healthy and hitting the gym with a plan at least four days a week. I focus mainly on weightlifting for building mass and calisthenics for staying toned and athletic. I recently started doing yoga and running more often. Switching my routines is always something that has always challenged me and avoided plateaus. Of course, there have been days where I skipped exercise but one ritual that I always stick to is maintaining a balanced diet.  I prepare my meals for the week and portion them accordingly. Meal prepping is important to me I have continued doing so the past four years.
